type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: GUYANA (DIVISION INTO COUNTIES) ACT under Short title. 1.  This Act may be cited as the Guyana (Division into Counties) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Guyana (Division into Counties) Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Counties of Demerara, Essequibo and Berbice.
type.context: GUYANA (DIVISION INTO COUNTIES) ACT under Counties of Demerara, Essequibo and Berbice. 2.  From and after the commencement of this Act Guyana shall be divided  into  three  distinct  and  separate  counties,  and  in  future Demerara  shall  be  called  and  styled  the  county  of  Demerara, Essequibo shall be called and styled the county of Essequibo, and Berbice shall be called and styled the county of Berbice.
type.description: From and after the commencement of this Act Guyana shall be divided  into  three  distinct  and  separate  counties,  and  in  future Demerara  shall  be  called  and  styled  the  county  of  Demerara, Essequibo shall be called and styled the county of Essequibo, and Berbice shall be called and styled the county of Berbice.
